targets.query: SELECT max("pop_ping_drop_rate") FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("downlink_throughput_bps")  * (-1) FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("uplink_throughput_bps")  / 100 FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("pop_ping_drop_rate") FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
